nodes.text: Killun Station was a station operated by the Imperial Security Bureau, a part of the Galactic Empire, located on Killun 71.

Killun Station was an Imperial Security Bureau outpost built onto one of the misty moon Killun 71's jagged landmasses. Since it held sensitive data including Imperial clearance codes, the station was tightly guarded. Stormtroopers were posted at all entrances and all visiting personnel and droids had to pass through walkthrough identification scanners.

In 2 BBY, Killun Station was breached by the rebel droids AP-5 and Chopper during a mission to steal clearance codes for the Phoenix Cell's upcoming raid on Lothal. While AP-5 managed to steal the clearance codes from the Central Computer Core, Chopper was remotely reprogammed by a team of Imperial intelligence officers led by LT-319, who was based aboard an IGV-55 surveillance vessel.
Killun Station first appeared in the Star Wars Rebels Season Three episode "Double Agent Droid", which premiered on Disney XD on March 11, 2017.
